example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (PP-LOC (P 在) (NP (NP-PN (NR 台湾)) (ADJP (JJ 黑暗)) (NP (NN 山区)))) (PP (P 与) (NP (NN 云雾))) (VP (VV 对话) (QP-EXT (CD 百万) (CLP (M 年)))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 桧木))) (PU ，) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 畏) (NP-OBJ (NN 湿气)))) (PU ，) (VP (QP-ADV (CD 千) (CLP (M 年))) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VA 朽))) (PU ，) (VP (SB 被) (VP (VRD (VV 认定) (VC 为)) (NP-OBJ (QP (OD 一) (CLP (M 级))) (NP (NN 木))))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 开始) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VV 无) (VP (VV 可) (VP (VV 挽回))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 厄运))))))
